---
title: "Crime Data Analysis"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(devtools)
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(tidycensus)
library(tmap)
library(censusr)
library(here)
library(janitor)
```

```{r}
crime <- st_read(
  here("data", "raw","Crime_Incidents_in_2021.geojson")) %>% clean_names()

neigh = st_read(
  here("data", "raw","dc_neigh.geojson")) %>% clean_names()
```

```{r}
df = st_join(crime, neigh)
```

```{r}
tmap_mode("view")

tm_shape(neigh) + tm_polygons("shapearea") +
  tm_shape(crime) + tm_dots()
```
